name: dragabee
description:
A worker placement game played in 10 second intervals. Place your busy bees on grass tiles to grow flowers with pollen. Place your buzzy bees on flower tiles to gather nectar and pollen. Place your dizzy bees on the tiles near the hive to form honey from that sweet nectar, to keep your bees fed.

Try to reach 30 bees!

Made by the Covert fam + Moog for Ludum Dare 51: "Every 10 Seconds"

Audio from OpenGameArt:

wyver9 - Good Mood Theme (8-Bit)

qubodup - 20 Rustles of Dry Leaves

Aeva - Gold Coin

Random User - Slime Ultimate the Best

Little Robot Sound Factory - UI Sound Effects Library

Font from Google Fonts:

ABeeZee
